page.title: 15A DAY IN MY LIFE
page.content: IN THE MORNING MY MUM WOKE ME WITH A CUP OF TEA AT 7.15.I GOT UP AND GOT WASHED AND DRESSED. I THEN WENT DOWNSTAIRS,HAD MY BREAKFAST,WENT BACK UPSTAIRS AND DID MY TEETH AND MY HAIR. I THEN GOT MY SWIMMING KIT AND MY SCHOOL BAG AND COAT AND WENT BACK DOWNSTAIRS FOR MY PACKED LUNCH. MUM SAID "BYE SEE YOU TONIGHT". I WENT TO MY GRANDMAS HOUSE AND GOT MY CRISPS. I THEN SAID "BYE"TO MY GRANDMA AND GRANDAD. DAD PICKED ME UP AND TOOK ME TO THE BUS STOP IN THE CAR. WHEN THE BUS CAME I GOT ON AND SAT DOWN WITH SARAH. WHEN WE GOT TO SCHOOL,I GOT OFF THE BUS AND CROSSED THE ROAD. I WENT INTO THE CLOAKROOM AND TOOK OFF MY COAT. I THEN WENT OUT INTO THE PLAYGROUND AND WALKED AROUND
